name: Untitled 3D Game
description:
I tried to make a 3D game on construct 3 with some youtube tutorials I found, look at the results. Explore this game experiment with the clearly-not-evil narrator and uncover the secrets hidden behind this facility (Spoiler alert: there are probably no secrets in the facility)

I highly recommend playing the game with audio on, or you will miss all the funny interactions with the narrator

Controls:

Walk - Arrows/WASD

Jump - Space
